author: BBC News
title: Albanian PM accuses Mahmood of 'ethnic stereotyping'
description: The home secretary told MPs on Monday around 700 Albanian families were "living in taxpayer-funded accommodation having failed their asylum claims".
content:
Mahmood's comments came as she announced major changes to the UK's "out of control and unfair" asylum system.
Speaking in the House of Commons, Mahmood said: "If we fail to deal with this crisis, weâ€¦ [+775 chars]
